title: His Majesty the Hypochondriac
text: His Majesty the Hypochondriac () is a 1918 German <a href="Silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="comedy%20film">comedy film</a> directed by <a href="Frederic%20Zelnik">Frederic Zelnik</a> and starring <a href="Lisa%20Weise">Lisa Weise</a>, <a href="Karl%20Beckersachs">Karl Beckersachs</a>, and <a href="Grete%20Diercks">Grete Diercks</a>.
